text: That is sexual harassment.

text: im going to submit a video of me doing this to one of those video dating things

name: luckyg
text: WELL? It's been six months already!

name: riazm
text: I think it's time someone taught you a little something about following through.

text: Ray would have done it...

name: soticoto
text: Ray gets things done.

name: raticus
text:

Aww yeah

name: undyingsong
text: This definitely needs more chubbies.

name: woodenteeth
text: Following through is NOT a good thing in all circumstances.

name: krispykorn
text: No, I think it is.

name: echidnaboy
text: Well then I wouldn't like to be near you when you fart

name: woodenteeth
text: There we go.

name: harry
text: dudes never do what they say they will do...

name: semiquaver
text: Come on.

name: saint
text:
When I saw your name, I pictured the guys from Tim and Eric doing this.
It was great fun... in my mind.

name: catachresis
text: I presume the "shoes" are glow-in-the-dark

name: aarongstock
text:
I presume you're not supposed to be able to see Ray, only the "shoes."

Testing: I presume you're not supposed to be able to see [color=white]Ray[/color], only his "shoes."

name: aarongstock
text: OK, no.

name: atticusonline
text: bbcode said a big Fuck You

name: gormster
text: I imagine the "Fuck" is yelled, but the "You" is whispered.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: In my head, the Diddy Bops is the theme song for this.

name: mattbeetee
text: I was thinking more along the lines of Disco Tex and the Sexolettes "Get Dancin'".

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
cats have Trouble wearing real shoes.

this is a fact.

name: soticoto
text: Trouble like dancing themselves into a state of blubbering pain, you mean?

name: mcwee
text: A comment left by mcwee was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by entropyends, mattbeetee, Jesler729, smashley, odei, equinn2006, farqussus, gethen, charchar, nathanielperson, echidnaboy, slalvation, tellumo)

name: hendetta
text: My favorite strip.

name: the_doz
text: Easily top 5, for me. I giggle like an idiot every time I see it.

name: life_is_good
text: it was the best birthday present ever

name: skellingtonloc
text: Jazz hands!

name: kkrusty
text: i love ray's expression in panel four...he looks like he honestly did not expect that wall to be there.

name: lrosetw8
text: But Ray, he's a problem solver, he hella figured out that conundrum.

name: peterjoel
text: Ray had the foresight to draw shoes on both sides of the paper

name: spinynorman
text: this is so fucking beautiful

name: heccibiggs
text: Hahahaha, I didn't notice that at first. Just made this strip all the extra hilarious. Cheers.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Something about the comic's composition (the hard white vertical lines seperating grey panels) made me miss the moving background entirely. Simply put, I always thought he was running in place, and oddly enthusiastic about it.

name: captainpeepers
text: Onstad uses a window to show movement.  This is genius.

name: mygoodfriend
text: You crazy, dog. It's a background. Lots of people do them.

name: dasilodavi
text: What the goddamn hell.

name: fidget
text: This is probably my favorite.  The fake surprise when he looks up at you cause you can see his real feet... its awesome.

name: jandruff
text:
I love how he stares at the viewer the whole time he's walking. Imagine this as an animated thing, the soundtrack being:
http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/4221/3500hd9.swf

name: spenham
text: Thank you for this gift! Definitely conjures up images of G-Man and his wonderful time on YTMND.

name: benthecartoon
text: Why does this not have 10 Million chubbies?

name: blarghamagarky
text: Today's strip written and directed by Ray.

name: almightygosh
text: The light being off is a great touch.

name: boredom_man
text:
How did I not realize how much I loved this one, before tonight?

And why is alka-seltzer the beverage that made me realize it?

name: mattylite
text:
Dear God,
Please make it so one of those people on the Achewood board who knows how to make animated gifs makes an animated gif of this strip.
Love, Mattylite.

name: mattylite
text:
Oh, well that was a lot easier than I thought it would be.

[IMGS OFF]

name: atticusonline
text:
make it longer!

that's what she said! no time!

but she did! NO TIME

name: aliiis
text: Guess who just got... TWO CHUBBIES??

name: rowen
text: Ray's "Check this OUT!" expression made this a five for me.

name: hendetta
text: Oh my holy moly. I didn't even notice that they were paper cut-outs until just a second ago. I thought Ray was wearing plastic bags over his shoes. Jesus, I am blind.

name: carlyle
text: Ray should do more strips.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Is he doing this at night? o_O
